ResearchProjectDef.label: basic defense structure
ResearchProjectDef.description: unusual techniques that can be used to build your colony harder to handle.

ResearchProjectDef.label: rebels arsenal
ResearchProjectDef.description: dig back to the youth of the Whelingnorther Humanoid Revolt and recreate their early-time apparels and weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: practical tools
ResearchProjectDef.description: Gain some insights of the neat tools developed by WHR. Good for both production and combat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: energy shield
ResearchProjectDef.description: primary understanding of energy shields used by WHR, which is a little different from common shield belts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced arsenal
ResearchProjectDef.description: study some published literatures of WHR and gain some insights of their more advanced arsenal.

ResearchProjectDef.label: siege equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: by studying the published techprints your colonists can now replica the armor and weapon used by the rebels' main forces.

ResearchProjectDef.label: infiltration equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: by studying the published techprints your colonists now masters the techniques used by the rebels' infiltration forces.

ResearchProjectDef.label: the wall of iron
ResearchProjectDef.description: now your colonists have enough understanding and ability to replica the arsenal used by the heaviest guardian troopers of the rebels.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic rite
ResearchProjectDef.description: basic knowladge of holding rites like those Whelingnorthans. the first step towards mysterious whelingnorther techniques.

ResearchProjectDef.label: matter transformation
ResearchProjectDef.description: the knowledge of using whelingnorther technique to reform normal materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: whelingnorther furniture
ResearchProjectDef.description: the technique of forming WNA style furnitures. these furnitures usually looks translucent and are built out of nothing.

ResearchProjectDef.label: whelingnorther structure
ResearchProjectDef.description: the technique of building walls, doors, and other thing. in common cases these buildings are invincible, whether built from thin air or a piece of actual material.

ResearchProjectDef.label: whelingnorther terraforming
ResearchProjectDef.description: the technique of changing the environment, reversible or irreversible.

ResearchProjectDef.label: whelingnorther defence system
ResearchProjectDef.description: some most simple methods to use whelingnorther technique to defend an outpost, a colony ot something else.

ResearchProjectDef.label: whelingnorther standard equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: the technique of crafting WNA standard equipments. even whelingnorthan themselves cannot ignore the power of these weapons.
